Title: Jonah Jang denies plans to dump PDP for APC
Summary: Rumours suggesting that former Plateau State Governor, Senator Jonah David Jang, is considering a move to the All Progressives Congress (APC) or that he is aware of any plan by Governor Caleb Mutfwang to decamp .

Title: INEC records 139,251 voter registrations in Lagos, 85,739 in Ogun
Summary: 139,251 residents completed applications in the first phase of the ongoing Continuous Voter Registration (CVR) exercise in Lagos . INEC Resident Electoral Commissioner in the state, Prof. Ayobami Salami, disclosed this in a release .

Title: White House steps up attacks on CNN
Summary: The White House steps up attacks on CNN . CNN is at the center of a financial battle that President Donald Trump is tied up in politically and through family . Echoing the president’s frequent anti-media barbs, senior members of the White House take aim at the network .

Title: Ekiti Knowledge Zone to create 26,000 jobs, attract $14m to economy – Oyebanji
Summary: Ekiti State Governor, Mr. Biodun Oyebanji, reaffirmed his commitment to creating over 26,000 direct and indirect jobs . Ekiti Knowledge Zone (EKZ) project will inject more than $14 million into the state's economy annually .

Title: Ekiti community accuses govt of alleged plot to impose monarch
Summary: Ekiti community accuses govt of alleged plot to impose monarch . Government dismisses allegations as baseless . Residents of Ijesa-Isu Ekiti, Ikole Local Government Area of Ekiti State .

Title: SECURITY BOOST: Police deploy 50 officers to Enugu LGA
Summary: Over 50 police officers deployed to newly constructed Divisional Police base at Camp, Nkpologu, in Adada development area of Enugu LGA . Council chairman, Mr. Chijioke Ezugwu, received over 50 officers .

Title: From Owerri to Abuja: Guinness Turns Premier League Weekend into an Epic Match Day Takeover
Summary: Guinness staged a sweeping, high-energy celebration of football, culture, and community . What unfolded was more than a football viewing; it was a portrait of how a brand has mastered the choreography of fandom, building on its cultural currency .

Title: Man kills nursing mother, baby over paternity feud in Katsina
Summary: Suspects lured nursing mother to outskirts of Sheme village, where they were murdered, burnt and thrown into a well . The suspects lured the woman to the outskirts of the village where she was murdered .

Title: Davido, Olamide, Asake set to light up December festivities in Lagos and Abuja
Summary: Some of Nigeria’s biggest stars are gearing up to take over the festive season . Lagos and Abuja prepare for a December packed with powerhouse performances . At the Nigerian Breweries Legendary Christmas Press Cocktail, organisers unveiled a star-first lineup that places the continent's most influential music heavyweights at the heart of this year�

Title: Nigeria’s exports hit N22.8trn in Q3 2025 as raw materials surge 136%
Summary: Nigeria’s export earnings rose to ₦22.8 trillion in Q3 of 2025 (Q3’25) driven largely by a strong rebound in raw material shipments . Raw materials shipments rose 136% in the same period .

Title: Rivers APC presents membership card to Fubara
Summary: Governor Siminalayi Fubara of Rivers State has officially received his All Progressives Congress membership card . The presentation was made by Rivers APC Chairman, Tony Okocha, at the Government House in Port Harcourt on Friday . The handover is seen as a step toward strengthening the APC’s presence in the

Title: Nigeria refutes Portugal summoning envoy over detained plane
Summary: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has rejected reports that the Nigerian Acting Head of Mission in Portugal (name withheld) was summoned by the Portuguese government over the movement of a Nigerian Air Force aircraft scheduled for maintenance in the European country . The aircraft, en route to Portugal for scheduled maintenance, landed in Bobo-Dioulasso after the crew detected

Title: I received death threats after joining Man Utd in 2004 — Rooney
Summary: Wayne Rooney reveals he received death threats after leaving boyhood club, Everton, to join Manchester United . The move, made in 2004 when Rooney was 18, saw him sign for the Red Devils in a £27 million deal after turning down a club-record contract from Everton . Rooney’s oldest son, Kai, is currently on

Title: JUST IN: Dangote refinery slashes petrol price to N699 per litre
Summary: The Dangote Petroleum Refinery has again reduced its petrol gantry price, slashing the ex-depot rate from N828 to N699 per litre . Title: Lagos APC mourns as ex-deputy gov loses son
Summary: Oluwafemi Adefulire is the only son of a former Lagos State Deputy Governor, Adejoke Orelope-Adefulire .
